comments.comment: Me ekek vath hari yanne ne. Ape rate innava ugath daksa ratata adaraya karana avanka piris a aya ekathu karagena aluth paksayak hadala new model eke anduvak bihi karanna one. A new model eke anduvak bihi karapu gaman ma karanna one aluth neethi paddathiyak hadala methek kal hitapu ha danata inna hora thakkadi desapaluvo mahajana mudal hora kala gatthu depola ha vides banku vala thiyena mudal rajasanthaka kireemai. A vagema danata jeevathun athara nathi hora thakkadi desapaluvange depola ha mudal bukthi vindina ayava hoyala evath rajasanthaka karanna one. Ovunta denna one gam udave duppath minissunta hadana geval. Depola vasayen hora thakkadi desapaluvanta aithi venne gam udavata hadana geval pamanai. Ovun methek kal horakam karapuva rajasanthaka karala labena mudal lankava vides rataval valata thiyena naya okkoma gevala ithuruth vevi. Me vidiyata karanna bari nam mona anduvak avath vadak ne. Manda buddika gobbayo vage janathava asabya comments karamin me hitapu ha danata inna hora thakkadi desapaluvo passe idiriyatath giyoth venne un janathava gobbayo bava danagena idiriyatath mahajana mudal hora kamin yahathin vanjabena ekai. Thanks

comments.comment: Areed with the speech but JVP too stole not money but weapons. When they attacked Air Force camps and police stations. Must not forget 1971 riots then 83 etc... Death threats were given to many people including police officers and there families murdered. We as kids lived in scare and went to school seeing burnt dead bodies on the roadside. Just because a president joined hands to get votes what we suffered as a police officers children only we know the terro caused. My question is what is terrorism? LTTE on one side PLOT, EPRLF then in the rest of the country suffered JVP is there any difference. I respect JVP and the Leader Rohana Vijeweera who was a sinhalese fighter but we needed fighters in war against terrorism but what's the balance?
